price: Kandi rwose Qur’an twarayoroheje kugira ngo ibe urwibutso. Ese hari uwibuka (ngo bimugirire akamaro)?
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ يَسَّرۡنَا ٱلۡقُرۡءَانَ لِلذِّكۡرِ فَهَلۡ مِن مُّدَّكِرٖ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: walaqad yassarnā al-qur'āna lildhik'ri fahal min muddakirin
